name: Employee of the month (Sleepy Dragon)
description:
You're an introverted employee and you've been tasked with giving a presentation to the whole company. In an attempt to ease your nerves you might have overdone the booze.
Go give the presentation anyway with your newfound courage and make it great!

Level 1 - You're a bit tipsy but you have to make your way to work - The big building on the top-left corner of the map (relative to the player's starting perspective).
All the booze you had is keeping you going despite appearing obviously drunk, but if you bump into too many people you'll fall and be too embarrassed to go to work.
Points lost
1 point lost for every normal person you bump into
2 points are lost if you bump into the zombie cop or paladin
3 points are lost if you bump into the swat team
Instant death if you bump into any zombies (apart from the cop), not because they eat people, but because they shame them

My solo entry for LDJam - 49
Theme - Unstable
Level 1 - Unstable movement for the player
Level 2 - (Planned) Player has to give a good presentation and choose the right words from a moving word cloud to say the right thing or end up insulting their boss and other colleagues. Unstable speech.

Graphics - Mixamo and Unity Asset Store
